select pc.commodity_no, pc.commodity_name, pc.barcode, pc.cost_price, pc.quantity, pc.line_amount, ap.package_id, ap.package_num, ap.logistics_num, ap.receipt_name, ap.receipt_tel_num, ap.receipt_address, ap.courier_company, ap.create_time, ap.transfer_time, ap.receipt_time, ap.status from au_package_commodity pc right join au_package ap on pc.package_id = ap.package_id where 1
AND ap.company_id = #{companyId}
AND ap.supplier_num LIKE concat('%',#{supplierNum},'%')
AND ap.supplier_name LIKE concat('%',#{supplierName},'%')
AND ap.package_num LIKE concat('%',#{packageNum},'%')
AND ap.logistics_num LIKE concat('%',#{logisticsNum},'%')
AND ap.status = #{status}
order by ap.transfer_time desc
